H0.text: Omnivore is the type of diet that makes humans among the most versatile mammals.

H1.text: Carnivore is the type of diet that characterizes humans as among the most versatile mammals.

H2.text: Herbivore is the type of diet that humans are among the most versatile of mammals with.

H3.text: Vegetarian is the type of diet with which humans are among the most versatile of mammals.

A4.text: In the fields of nutrition, sociology and psychology the terms 'omnivore' & 'omnivory' is often used to distinguish prototypical highly diverse human diet patterns from restricted diet patterns that exclude major categories of food.

A5.text: humans are omnivores due to their capability to obtain energy and nutrients from both plant and animal materials.
